contest-event.event-date:
July 16, 1938 D Shardlow Contest
Shardlow Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
shardlow-contest
None
Recollections of Balfe
Shardlow, Derbyshire
Advert in Brass Band News June 1938 states the test piece will be "Round the Camp Fire", however result in Brass Band News August 1938 states that "Recollections of Balfe" was the test piece. March contest - 1st Leicester Imperial, 2nd Butterley Colliery. 7 bands competed.
Jan. 23, 2014, 9:35 a.m. Jan. 23, 2014, 9:40 a.m.
1 Kirby Imperial Simeon Iliffe
2 Long Eaton Silver Prize Band Henry Evetts
3 Rolls Royce (Derby) Band H. D. Parker
4 Loscoe Miners T. Webster
